title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or Docker container; includes Go server, REST & pull-model registry.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API—chat, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as Python SDK (chat, embed, create).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving Ollama models for chat, embeddings, tool-calling and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) for any Ollama model; conversations, multi-user, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: TUI (terminal UI) client written in Rust—interactive chat, model switcher, conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot (vim/Neovim)
summary: Neovim plugin that redirects GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private code completion.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Template repo to build Chainlit conversational apps backed by Ollama models; includes RAG example.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rag (privateGPT-style)
summary: Minimal RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs; 100% local, no OpenAI keys.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune with LoRA, multimodal vision, function-calling, CI benchmarks, Raspberry Pi builds.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with reactive streaming, Spring Boot starter, and Micronaut integration.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service + GPU support inside CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes; supports summarization, translation, Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building search & QA pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for approval sentiment or auto-classification.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and common models; reproducible deployments on NixOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats through Ollama; supports group whitelist, session memory, and streaming replies.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Experimental gRPC server shim in Go that fronts Ollama REST API for high-performance streaming in micro-services.

title: ollama-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator to declaratively deploy and scale Ollama models as custom resources; handles model pre-pull and GPU placement.
